section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of [this subchapter], the term:

para.text: A private vehicle-for-hire, as that term is defined in § 50-301.03(16A); or
A public vehicle-for-hire, as that term is defined in § 50-301.03(17).
"Wheelchair-accessible vehicle" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-301.03(32).

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 21-242: § 4 of D.C. Law 21-242 provided that the creation of this section by § 3(c) of D.C. Law 21-242 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
